PrecisOrder (a) assigning the Hon. ROBERT G. THIBAULT, a Minister of State, to assist the Minister for the Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency in the discharge of his responsibilities, and (b) terminating the assignment conferred upon the Hon. J. Bernard Boudreau.
